TextLibrary.Text: Flicker
Well, you are a lot smaller than I imagined. I'll try to make this quick.
Well, you are a lot smaller than I imagined. I'll try to make this quick.
Well, you are a lot smaller than I imagined. I'll try to make this quick.
Well, you are a lot smaller than I imagined. I'll try to make this quick.
Wait! Please! PLEASE! Don't kill me!
Wait! Please! PLEASE! Don't kill me!
Wait! Please! PLEASE! Don't kill me!
Wait! Please! PLEASE! Don't kill me!
What? You can talk?
What? You can talk?
What? You can talk?
What? You can talk?
Talk? Of course I can talk! I'm a Dragon! What did you think I was? A big gold iguana?
Talk? Of course I can talk! I'm a Dragon! What did you think I was? A big gold iguana?
Talk? Of course I can talk! I'm a Dragon! What did you think I was? A big gold iguana?
Talk? Of course I can talk! I'm a Dragon! What did you think I was? A big gold iguana?
Umm... no. I just never knew that Dragons could talk. Look, I'm sorry about this, but talking or not you just can't go around eating Dwarven miners.
Umm... no. I just never knew that Dragons could talk. Look, I'm sorry about this, but talking or not you just can't go around eating Dwarven miners.
Umm... no. I just never knew that Dragons could talk. Look, I'm sorry about this, but talking or not you just can't go around eating Dwarven miners.
Umm... no. I just never knew that Dragons could talk. Look, I'm sorry about this, but talking or not you just can't go around eating Dwarven miners.
Eating Dwarves? Please! Gimme a break! Do I look like I'm starving? Why would anyone eat a Dwarf unless they were starving? Ack!
Eating Dwarves? Please! Gimme a break! Do I look like I'm starving? Why would anyone eat a Dwarf unless they were starving? Ack!
Eating Dwarves? Please! Gimme a break! Do I look like I'm starving? Why would anyone eat a Dwarf unless they were starving? Ack!
Eating Dwarves? Please! Gimme a break! Do I look like I'm starving? Why would anyone eat a Dwarf unless they were starving? Ack!
So what are you doing here if you're not eating the Dwarves?
So what are you doing here if you're not eating the Dwarves?
So what are you doing here if you're not eating the Dwarves?
So what are you doing here if you're not eating the Dwarves?
I've come looking for help. It's my homeland - all the Dragons are gone. Well, all except old Kelthurax, and I can't wake HIM up. I don't know what to do!
I've come looking for help. It's my homeland - all the Dragons are gone. Well, all except old Kelthurax, and I can't wake HIM up. I don't know what to do!
I've come looking for help. It's my homeland - all the Dragons are gone. Well, all except old Kelthurax, and I can't wake HIM up. I don't know what to do!
I've come looking for help. It's my homeland - all the Dragons are gone. Well, all except old Kelthurax, and I can't wake HIM up. I don't know what to do!
I would help you, but I desperately need to travel northwest through the mountains. The Dragonrealm is northeast of here - it's out of my way.
I would help you, but I desperately need to travel northwest through the mountains. The Dragonrealm is northeast of here - it's out of my way.
I would help you, but I desperately need to travel northwest through the mountains. The Dragonrealm is northeast of here - it's out of my way.
I would help you, but I desperately need to travel northwest through the mountains. The Dragonrealm is northeast of here - it's out of my way.
Look, I may be young, but I can see you're not from around here. You'll never find your way through those mountains. It's a maze up there.
Look, I may be young, but I can see you're not from around here. You'll never find your way through those mountains. It's a maze up there.
Look, I may be young, but I can see you're not from around here. You'll never find your way through those mountains. It's a maze up there.
Look, I may be young, but I can see you're not from around here. You'll never find your way through those mountains. It's a maze up there.
If you come with me to the Dragonrealm and help me look for the Dragons, then I will help you find your way north. How about it?
If you come with me to the Dragonrealm and help me look for the Dragons, then I will help you find your way north. How about it?
If you come with me to the Dragonrealm and help me look for the Dragons, then I will help you find your way north. How about it?
If you come with me to the Dragonrealm and help me look for the Dragons, then I will help you find your way north. How about it?
The Dragonrealm it is then. Do you have a name?
The Dragonrealm it is then. Do you have a name?
The Dragonrealm it is then. Do you have a name?
The Dragonrealm it is then. Do you have a name?
They call me Flicker.
They call me Flicker.
They call me Flicker.
They call me Flicker.
